scripts.validate: if [ -s src/deploy.xml ]; then npm run sdfvalidatesoft; else echo "no files/objects to deploy"; fi;
scripts.deploy: if [ -s src/deploy.xml ]; then npm run sdfdeploy; else echo "no files/objects to deploy"; fi;
scripts.sdfvalidatesoft: node ci/sdfauth.js && sudo suitecloud project:adddependencies && sudo suitecloud project:validate --server
scripts.sdfdeploy: node ci/sdfauth.js && suitecloud project:adddependencies && suitecloud project:validate --server &&  suitecloud project:deploy
